isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT, CONNECTING RODS AND PISTONS - Camshaft Bushings

svcproc.title: Check for Wear and Proper Running Clearance

step1.para: Use a micrometer to measure each camshaft bearing journal diameter at two locations 90° apart. Record the average of these two measurements.

With the camshaft bushings installed in the crankcase, use a telescoping gauge and micrometer to measure each camshaft bushing inner diameter at two locations 90° apart. Record the average of these two measurements.
Subtract the two averages to determine the running oil clearance. If the result exceeds the specification, replace the camshaft bushings.
